email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 15,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN WAVE, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric ton. The laycan is set for October 20 to October 25, with a loading window of 48 hours.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40.00 per metric ton?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 20 to October 25, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on October 20, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
